snippet.textDisplay:
There s no a single country on the planet not containing a Chinese person.
These out brakes which always seem to emanate from China do not surprise me in the least.
Regardless of what I think of them on a personal level is not the issue here but I have witnessed first hand whilst working in an engineering company in Burlington Ontario Canada in the same office as two Chinese men.
They would bring in each day for their lunch left over food from home "usually meat and rice" then after lunch they would dump the remains of their meals in to a plastic bin right next to their desks. After two weeks this bin began to stink the entire office out. to the extent that I started to sit in my car in the parking lot to have my lunch.
On the third week it was reported that rats were scurrying around inside the offices. So the owners placed rat poison down to kill them which resulted in the rats dying in the cavities of the walls causing more odor and stink to the situation. Eventually I had to leave the place and the rotting food and the rats to the China men who seemed to think it all very normal.

snippet.textDisplay:
Okay, don't see what's going on? Let me explain.



Here are the patents on the coronavirus:



https://patents.google.com/patent/CA1337267C/en?q=A61K39%2f215



The Patent for Canine Respiratory Coronavirus. It was patented in 1984, and the patent expired on January 24, 2020. What happens when the patent expires is that anyone can produce the virus without paying "royalty" to the original inventor. Here, billions of dollars come from the sale of vaccines after the population has been frightened and enough people have died.



The respiratory corona virus was able to spread from dogs to cattle and to pigs. It was also able to cross over to humans. Like all viruses, coronaviruses can mutate naturally or by human manipulation.



Another patent:



https://patents.google.com/patent/EP3172319B1/en



Then we also have the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation which you can say a lot of wonder about ..



+ Netflix also released the new show "Pandemic" as none other than Bill and Melinda Gates. It is an important propaganda piece, where vaccines are glorified and put on a shelf.



The world today has 6.8 billion people. Heading up to about nine billion. Now if we do a really great job on new vaccines, health care, reproductive health services, we could lower that by maybe 10 or 15 percent.



~ Bill Gates

snippet.textDisplay:
my dear folks, i wish you guys read the following words. here are what we know about the virus outbreak in china:
1) the chinese government is hiding the number of the infected and the dead from the very beginning.
1.1) the outbreak started in early dec 2019 but the official denied it till late jan 2020.
1.2) the local authority in wuhan city arrested 8 people in jan 1st 2020 as those people disclosed the outbreak via social media.
1.3) the official number of the infected remained 41 for half a month till jan 20th, the day that the communist party announced to deal with the outbreak seriously.
1.4) the mayor of wuhan city disclosed on a live interview on the national tv that the number was hidden as he wasnt authorized before jan 20th. the tv hostess stopped him and finished the live interview immediately.
1.5) front line doctors disclosed that only approximately 5% of those infected were tested and disclosed, not because of a lack of tester, but because beijing doesn't want the number goes up too much.
1.6) the current real number of infected can be 10 to 30 times higher than the number disclosed by the chinese government.
2) the chinese government is not taking effective measure to stop the virus outbreak.
2.1) the chinese government rejected foreign assistance.
2.2) the local authority in wuhan city threatened individuals and ngos who were trying to donate supplies to hospitals directly, as by law only a few official departments are allowed to accept donations.
2.3) the chinese red cross, actually a red cross fully operated by the communist party, took over all civilian donations and charged hospitals 6% to 8% so called administration fee.
2.4) front line doctors disclosed that the supplies distributed by the official departments are fake or in very low quality.
3) the cause of the virus outbreak is unknown.
3.1) the chinese government accused that wuhan people's consumption of wild life is the cause.
3.2) approximately one third of early infections had nothing to do with wild life consumption.
3.3) a national lab which is capable of making weaponized coronavirus is located in wuhan city.
3.4) the national tv disclosed in 2018 that the lab was successful on a research over coronavirus.
3.5) the chinese government avoided talking about the lab during this outbreak.
so, any western government, please stop assessing the virus outbreak based on chinese government's official report. it's untrustworthy. and please, for all folks, rethink your relationship with china.

snippet.textDisplay:
Just wish Chinese President Xi Jinping and his cabinet all get it and die from it. Their insane thuggish oversight & intimidation regarding EVERYTHING China is involved with is terrifying.

The arrogance, insanity, threats and aggressive cruel behaviour toward anything even vaguely resembling criticism is even more rabid than Trump's behaviour & government.

Imaging being the American NBA Commissioner and China contacting you personally demanding that you fire one of your team coach and have him make an open public apology for expressing his perfectly reasonable views on the Hong Kong protestors... The overwhelming arrogance & insanity that they think they can actually demand things like that is crazy. That goes way beyond Trump levels into North Korea-esque cartoonish villainy.

As an Aussie I genuinely fear for what may come. We will be the first 'Western Cultured' nation to assimilate with China, it is happening now, where I live white people are the minority, which is fine, it's Australia, aside from the aboriginals we're all immigrants. The Chinese people are polite, hard working, surprisingly friendly, they want to assimilate, most every white friend I have has dated a Chinese girl at least once. It's just the government that scares me and other Aussies, the people however are fine.

snippet.textDisplay: The rate of increase.... the geometric progression of how fast these numbers grow.....will be VASTLY DIFFERENT....once we know if there is a contagious aspect during the 2-14 day early incubation period, or not. This is a key point to get right before we go and show predictive charts. Yet still.......we don't have a clear answer on this. The Chinese govt who was blamed for not being open on information on previous outbreaks.....now says the virus is asymptomatic, and is contagious when there are no outward signs. Yet....the US, including the CDC, say that this isn't true....that instead this virus acts like other viruses....and is only contagious when there are outward signs. This policy extends to the "Screening" that is done at airports which include  seeing if the person has a temperature, a fever, etc. This method can be totally ineffective...and the rate of increase can be magnitudes more...if this assumption of being contagious only when showing symptoms...is false. We need this nugget of information before we assign any other predictive charts to this outbreak.
snippet.textOriginal: The rate of increase.... the geometric progression of how fast these numbers grow.....will be VASTLY DIFFERENT....once we know if there is a contagious aspect during the 2-14 day early incubation period, or not. This is a key point to get right before we go and show predictive charts. Yet still.......we don't have a clear answer on this. The Chinese govt who was blamed for not being open on information on previous outbreaks.....now says the virus is asymptomatic, and is contagious when there are no outward signs. Yet....the US, including the CDC, say that this isn't true....that instead this virus acts like other viruses....and is only contagious when there are outward signs. This policy extends to the "Screening" that is done at airports which include  seeing if the person has a temperature, a fever, etc. This method can be totally ineffective...and the rate of increase can be magnitudes more...if this assumption of being contagious only when showing symptoms...is false. We need this nugget of information before we assign any other predictive charts to this outbreak.

snippet.textDisplay: The normal mortality rate in any city would be around 8 per 1000 per year. In a city of 11m this would equate to 88,000 deaths per year if no-one new was born. Over the six weeks that the Wuhan virus has been active (Dec 19 -Jan 20) this would equate to 88,000x6/52 = 10,154 deaths.  Repeating that…you would normally expect during the period of the active virus 10,000 people to die of all causes. It does not then require much ingenuity to record 132 of those deaths as being due to the virus, particularly if these are elderly people with existing illnesses. My point is they could literally make the death rate anything they wanted an no-one is going to be any the wiser.  This is what I strongly suspect is going on because I do not see much urgency or panic being displayed by health officials in other countries particularly Australia, the UK and US and indeed there are NO deaths recorded in any country outside of mainland China.  It is almost as though they are really reluctant to jeopardise the economy for the sake of a virus that they already know will not be lethal.
snippet.textOriginal: The normal mortality rate in any city would be around 8 per 1000 per year. In a city of 11m this would equate to 88,000 deaths per year if no-one new was born. Over the six weeks that the Wuhan virus has been active (Dec 19 -Jan 20) this would equate to 88,000x6/52 = 10,154 deaths.  Repeating that…you would normally expect during the period of the active virus 10,000 people to die of all causes. It does not then require much ingenuity to record 132 of those deaths as being due to the virus, particularly if these are elderly people with existing illnesses. My point is they could literally make the death rate anything they wanted an no-one is going to be any the wiser.  This is what I strongly suspect is going on because I do not see much urgency or panic being displayed by health officials in other countries particularly Australia, the UK and US and indeed there are NO deaths recorded in any country outside of mainland China.  It is almost as though they are really reluctant to jeopardise the economy for the sake of a virus that they already know will not be lethal.
